channel.title: Moving files between gateway and workstation and vice versa
channel.description:
Hi, is it possible to move my tor data folder to my workstation so I can then email it to another workstation on a complete separate server. Once I have tor data folder on the new workstation I will then need to move it back to that workstations gateway.
My aim is to use a hidden service address I have on my old server on my new server. Can I do this? I am using KVM.

item.title: Moving files between gateway and workstation and vice versa
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Easy. Add the same shared folder to both the workstation and gateway VMs and transfer files across it.

Donâ€™t forget to encrypt the contents of course.

If you want to avoid identity linking use a dedicated email address to send and open the contents on your other server.

Read full topic
item.source: Moving files between gateway and workstation and vice versa
